title: Teen killed in Providence Park, Richmond Police seeking armed suspect
content:
RICHMOND, VA (WWBT) -
Richmond police identified the victim of the city's latest homicide as a 17-year-old boy.
George M. Carrington of Chimborazo Boulevard was found shot to death outside a car around 5:39 p.m. Friday following a crash at the intersection of Milton St. and Meadowbridge Rd.
Police are now looking for 17-year-old Ishmael D. Brown, wanted on charges of murder. Police say he is armed and dangerous.
Brown is 6’0" tall, weighs about 150 pounds, has black hair and brown eyes.
Officers were outside of a home on Meadowbridge Road on Friday hoping to talk to a person of interest. Officers called the name of that person to come out with hands up for hours. Once police made entry, they found no one inside the home. Officers say the family who lives in the home was cooperative with them.
Police ask anyone with information to contact Crime Stoppers at (804) 780-1000 .
